entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is mentioned as the one who lunged for the tiny beaded bag and pulled out an ornate picture frame.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as helping Hermione lift the empty portrait of Phineas Nigellus free of her bag.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as pulling out an ornate picture frame from her bag and keeping her wand pointing at it.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is mentioned as the one who hangs right beside the case in Dumbledore's office.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having an oï¬ƒce where Phineas Nigellus hangs.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is mentioned as being swapped for a fake while it was in Dumbledore's office.

entities.name: portrait
entities.description: The portrait of Phineas Nigellus is mentioned as being lifted free of Hermione's bag.

relationships.description: Harry helped Hermione lift the empty portrait of Phineas Nigellus free of her bag.
Phineas Nigellus would have seen it happen if somebody swapped the real sword for the fake while it was in Dumbledore's office.
